short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Covers TikTok, Instagram (Reels), YouTube (Shorts), and Facebook (Reels)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Escape the Short-Form Video Trap

Tired of wasting hours on endless scrolling?

Our Chrome extension helps you take back control by blocking all short-form video content. No more TikTok, Instagram Reels, YouTube Shorts, or Facebook Reels.

What It Does
- Blocks access to short-form video platforms.
- Hides short-form content from your feeds.
- Removes navigation buttons leading to short-form videos.

This ensures you won’t be tempted to click, scroll, or get sucked into the endless loop of dopamine hits.

Why Install It?
- Regain Focus: Short videos are designed to distract. Remove them to focus on things that matter—your work, studies, or hobbies.
- Improve Your Mental Health: Avoid the stress and fatigue caused by overstimulation from short-form content.
- Save Time: Hours can disappear in minutes. This extension gives you that time back.
- Reduce Dopamine Addiction: Short-form content manipulates your brain's reward system. Break free from the cycle and rediscover long-term satisfaction.

Who Is It For?
- Students: Stay productive and focused on your studies.
- Professionals: Focus on work without distractions.
- Parents: Help your kids develop healthier online habits.
- Anyone: Take back control of your time and attention.

Ready to Take Control?
Install the extension now and say goodbye to distractions. Build better habits, boost productivity, and enjoy a clearer mind.

Take the first step toward a distraction-free digital life today!
